channel.title: I need help with my server... Cowscape
channel.description:
I got a few things i need help with...
1. Im useing the Server Cheese Scape.. And It keeps on Banning my Owner accounts everythign i use ::Noclip and ::pickup 2. I want to know how to make it stop snowing... 3. I need some help with a stacking inventory glitch. Everytime i withdraw stackable items like Coins or runes.. it only withdraws one and takes up a new space for ever one i withdraw... (Example: I withdraw 1gp. it takes up 1 space. I withdraw another 1gp. now there are 2 spaces taken each saying 1gp. if i withdraw 5gp then there will be now 7 spaces each saying 1gp.) 3. I cant Sell anything to stores. 4. I want the ::bank Command available for all PlayerRights. 5. Some Items are Faulty... 6. this one goes with 5. How do i Make items visable... some like the Crystal bow and sheilds never appear. 7. How do i use No-ip... I used to have an old server named Winterscape (Winter Wonder Land) and I used a different ip thingy... If anyone can remind me of that... id be grateful. and How do i change the Player Starting spot.?
Please Help...

item.title: I need help with my server... Cowscape
item.dc:creator: @Lief Lief
item.description:
@Lief wrote:

Well I have a new question… How do i make my ::goup and ::godown work for everyone? right now it says…

} else if (command.startsWith("goup") && playerRights => 2) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel += 1;
That doesnt work for admins either…

} else if (command.startsWith("godown") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lief")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel -= 1;
SOOO i need some help with this…[br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2007, 12:53:03 AM[/size][hr]anyone there?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2007, 01:00:42 AM[/size][hr]srry for tripple posting but… i fiddle with the iegt on my character a bit… and now he is stuck in hiegt 2… the only way i can lowering him right now is buy useing the character edit… and ots mpt wprlomg spp hes stuck… and everyone is in black i tried teleing places… I need help badly now…

Read full topic
